title: Gold IV Looking for Gold III+ Duo Partner to help stabilize my MMR drop (Almost Gold II ---> IV)
body:
I need someone I can trust and completely dominate games with. Been on a downward spiral since Pre-Season where if a random makes a mistake early on in the game, it can snowball the game in the enemy team's favor really quickly.

I can play anywhere well, but preferably I'd like either a Mid Main that I can jungle with and snowball their lane (or vice versa), or an AD Carry main that I can support and get going early (or vice versa).

replies.body: As everyone knows, you may have been carried to your rank but you will sooner or later drop down to your real skill level.

> [{quoted}](name=B0B,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=JYY3mgYE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-02T15:25:14.173+0000)
>
> As everyone knows, you may have been carried to your rank but you will sooner or later drop down to your real skill level.

No, I'm just on tilt and it seems prolonged because I can't play much ranked atm because I have siblings at home on the net due to it being school holidays. I'd ask people in my ranked team if they wanted to duo but they're rarely at home when I'm on LoL.

EDIT: Just need ONE person I can trust to reduce the chance of getting that player that picks a FotM and feeds, or gets overconfident and throws, or is just blatantly rude.
keep tilting rager toxic  bronze 5 gg afk surrender 20
"looking for someone higher than me to carry me plz"

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=JYY3mgYE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-02T11:22:08.972+0000)
>
> "looking for someone higher than me to carry me plz"

No, the title literally explains my situation. I'm really ~Gold II quality but I've had a bad run since all the little school kids started holidays (not that it's necessarily directly linked - but I have noticed a drop in the quality of games). I just need someone who will be available during the week when schools resume (meaning people ~17+) to play with consistently over the next season. My MMR has dropped by my quality hasn't.

> [{quoted}](name=itsHurricane,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=JYY3mgYE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-02T13:25:38.981+0000)
>
> No, the title literally explains my situation. I'm really **~Gold II quality but** I've had a bad run since all the little school kids started holidays (not that it's necessarily directly linked - but I have noticed a drop in the quality of games). I just need someone who will be available during the week when schools resume (meaning people ~17+) to play with consistently over the next season. My MMR has dropped by my quality hasn't.


there is your problem, your true elo is bronze 5 friend.

I support :) add me if u want to adc me, take it or leave it 

-CandySlay3r
Oh yeah, you can leave a reply here or just add me in game.
